attributes.additional_details:
When food is readily available, animals will gather in abnormally large numbers and leave mess which may cause health problems.
Droppings from Pigeons, Crows Seagulls are very acidic and will eventually corrode the structure they are left on. The acid from the bird droppings will eat through machinery, roofs, wood, steel, metal and paint. Bird droppings can also clog ventilation ducts and obstruct drainage systems. Birds will nest in the gutters and clog them up. Birds expect to be fed by people and have become aggressive,. Bird’s nests and droppings can contain a variety of pest insects and disease bacteria that can be passed on to humans
We, the undersigned, call upon the Department to undertake national Pest Control initiatives
•	trapping,
•	egg pricking or oiling,
•	scaring,
•	proofing.

Please help us to do this for our community by signing the below Petition
